# **Predicting Hit Songs**


## Handle categorical data

```{r}
data = read.csv("datasets/categ_to_num.csv")
head(data)
explicit_data = read.csv("datasets/tracks_explicit2.csv")
head(explicit_data)
#get the entries from explicit_data whose id is in data$uri

d_explicit = explicit_data[explicit_data$id %in% data$uri, ]
d_data = data[data$uri %in% explicit_data$id , ]
nrow(d_explicit)
nrow(d_data)
head(d)
head(data)
#make a column in data called explicit and take values from d$explicit mappping the id's
d_data$explicit = 0
for(i in 1:nrow(d_data)){
  d_data$explicit[i] = d_explicit$explicit[d_explicit$id == d_data$uri[i]]
}
write.csv(d_data, "datasets/combined_data_explicit.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
